page.title: 01TADWORTH AND EPSOM DOWNS
page.content: The area covered by our three schools contains many varied features. Much of it is{residential with examples of large individual houses, suburban 'semis', large council estates and 'high rise' blocks of flats. There are also large areas of {open public space}in particular, {Epsom Downs}which are used for many open-air leisure pursuits. Dominating the Downs is{Epsom {Race Course,}and several of our pages are used to describe{Derby {Day }and it's effects on the local environment. We have also covered{Tadworth {Village Week}and the{Tadworth {Court Children's Hospital,}recently saved from closure by public support.
